Summon a mighty creature of the Red Grail?

Summon a creature of the Forge of Days?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more power. To call forth this smoky, tricksy entity, I'll need a significant power of Forge, as well as a little Winter and Knock.
Summon a creature of the Red Grail?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more power. To call forth this monstrous, if affectionate, entity, I'll need a significant intensity of Grail, and a little Moth and Knock.
Summon a thing from behind mirrors?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more power. To call forth this subtle, fragile, murderous thing, I'll need a significant intensity of Lantern, and a little Knock and Edge.
Summon a creature of the Thunderskin?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more power. To call forth this merry, ceaseless, merciless thing, I'll need a significant intensity of Heart, and a little Knock and Edge.
Summon a creature of the Sun-in-Rags?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more power. To call forth this chilly and shining thing, I'll need a very significant intensity of Winter, and a little Knock and Edge.
Summon one of the throng of the Dead?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more power. To call forth this wretched, voiceless thing, I'll need Winter at the fourth intensity, and a little Knock and Heart.
Infuse a corpse with the power of the Cartographer of Scars?
I've found a useful conjunction of aspects, but I need more. With a little more Winter aspect, a little more Edge, and a Corpse, I might create a brutal servant.
Infuse a corpse with the power of the Ring-Yew?
With a little more Winter aspect, a little more Moth, and a Corpse, I might create a cunning servant.
